story_line.text: The first customer enters the shop.
Orion: Apologies for intruding so early.
Smith: I've got work to do, be brief.
Smith: No issue, I'm here to help.
Orion: I'll get on with it, then
Orion: Impressive attitude. I won't take much of your time
Orion: Perfect. Then I am going to order the strongest sword that you can make.
Orion: A frog like creature, Ktinos, has been rampaging in the Sena swamp. I needn't tell you why this is problematic...
*The Ruthless Orion gives the Smith a questioning look*
*Sigh* The herbalists gather their medicinal plants from the Swamp outskirts. Apparently the frog is usually pretty docile
*The orion looks away for a moment* Something seems to be setting the creature off. It... and others
*They look back at the smith* You needn't be concerned. It will be dealt with. We've Orions with festering wounds and children with fevers, so I apologise for rushing you, but this request is urgent.
Orion: I'll see you soon, then. Be ready
